attributes.action: Request a Centre-Left Coalition to win the General Election.
attributes.background: We respectfully request that the leaders and members of the Labour, Liberal Democrat, SNP, Green and other Centre-Left Parties join together in a real and cohesive Alliance to prevent the Conservatives  (with or without UKIP) dragging our Nation down for another 5 years.

rejection.details: This petition is calling on political parties, not the Government or Parliament, to take action.
